body.name: Messenger Bag Men,Waterproof Crossbody Bag,Satchel Shoulder Bag

features: 【QUALITY MATERIALS】: Made of wear-resistant high-quality canvas, rich texture, not easy to damage, safe and durable. We use a better reinforced stitching method to make it more comfortable for you to carry.

【MULTI-POCKET SHOULDER BAG】: 1 zipper pocket on the flap, 1 zipper pocket on the back, 2 side pockets, 2 slip pockets under the flap; Inside the bag there is a large main zipper pocket, 2 slip pockets and 1 ID storage pocket. Make all the stored things in order and more convenient to find.

【ANTI-THEFT CROSSBODY BAG】: 2 sturdy snaps and a large zipper closure on the front to keep your stuff safe, the anti-theft zipper on the back can be used to store valuables, such as cell phones, wallets, etc.

【LARGE CAPACITY COMMUTER BAG】: External dimensions are 16.5 x 12.6 x 6.0 inches (large size style) && 14.2 x 12.6 x 6.3 inches (small size style), shoulder strap length: 23.2-51.9 inches. The large style can hold up to a 15.6" notebook and the small style can hold up to a 13" notebook to meet your work or study needs at work or school. It can hold multiple items at the same time. Get the WEPLAN messenger bag and you will receive many compliments from your family and friends.

【COMFORTABLE AND ADJUSTABLE SHOULDER STRAP】: You can adjust the length of the shoulder strap to the most suitable length at any time with the metal adjustment buckle. Relieve your fatigue and reduce the pressure on your shoulder during use. This classic messenger bag for men and women can be used for work, party, commuting, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Metal Adjustment Buckle Anti-theft Buckle Design Large Capacity Main Pocket Back Zip Pocket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice bag for my work laptop and files.
reviews.reviewText: I actually really enjoy this bag. Sure it’s not namebrand, but I’m not a namebrand type of person. I would like quality over name. This one checked out with affordability and quality. It uses both clasps on the sides and zippers. None of which have failed me yet I do not frequently unzip and zip so that might be a benefiting factor. It’s not super wide so if you have a very wide laptop, you may find yourself putting it in and out on a diagonal but for most standard size laptops. For paperwork files if it’s fine, it can fit at least a handbook worth without issue could probably even do a decent size textbook with files. I wouldn’t say it’s expandable by a whole lot you will find yourself probably struggling if you try to overpack it I do like that it has multiple pockets on both sides of front zipper rear zipper, it is canvas so it’s pretty sturdy and hold up and it has an adjustable strap. That is also very nice. The stitching is decent and appropriate and I haven’t found any issues with that either. Overall I think for what it cost it’s a good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and nice
reviews.reviewText: This bag is very sturdy and very stylish. It is spacious. I always have extra items to lug around, and this bag holds them all! I love it. I plan on buying it in multiple colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Be prepared to fix your bag's threadwork if it's broken !
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to school, I have classes that do not require many books. I was tired of having a worn out Jansport backpack at hand, so I browsed amazon for a cute messenger bag. I came across this messenger bag. It was affordable, I loved the number of pockets it had incorporated into its design, the color-scheme options were aesthetically pleasing to me, and it matched the measurements to just barely fit my Chromebook inside of its main pocket. Those factors alone were enough to convince me to purchase it.For when it came in in the mail, I unpacked it and saw that the loophole for one side of the straps was undone. It was then when I realized that the loop may have broken during transit. The thread that held it in place was loose and practically torn apart. Luckily, I was crafty enough to fix it by removing the old threads and sewing the loophole back into place by comparing it to the other loophole that was in place. It was a hassle, and it killed my mood of having a new bag for school, but it is what it is. I'm glad it worked out in the end.Other than that issue, the quality of this bag was relatively decent. The buckles at the front of the bag are easily adjustable, my school materials were snugly fit inside of the compartments, it's convenient to my needs, and the design was exactly what was displayed.Ultimately, if you're going to purchase this bag, be sure to have materials readily available if it was broken in transit. As for when you use this bag and with how easily one loophole for my bag's strap broke, I advise to not put heavy things inside. Other than that, it's a nice bag :)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect as an everyday commuter bag
reviews.reviewText: I like the quality of the bag. I like the denim feel and it’s rugged enough for everyday commuter. All of the straps appear secure. In the main compartment I have room for my 13 inch laptop, its charger and two full-size notebooks. The pockets are roomy but not loose. I'm satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Messenger Bag For School
reviews.reviewText: This bag is perfect for me. Not too big or small, though a bigger size is available as well as different colors. It has plenty of deep pockets for my cell phone my cup or water bottle. I was able to fit all my notebooks as well as my laptop. The quality of great and the price was even better... I have no complaints about this product...All I got are compliments and where did I get the bag....Of course I got it on AMAZON....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my new daily school bag
reviews.reviewText: this is a perfect size for me since I only go half days to my school. very study, I haven't found anything too heavy for this bag. I bought a perfect size for my school computer but should've gotten a bigger bag so i could use it for my real computer. very worth it if you just need a small bag for school. I do with it came with a shoulder pad, because if you have something you heavy in it, it will start hurting a bit on your shoulders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy & easy to carry
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for hubby. He loves it! It has a lot of room to carry all our purchases while we were on our vacation. Seems sturdy enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bag has nice canvas fabric making it really durable. There's a lot of pockets and room which is nice. The strap is wide and thick so it won't dig in your shoulder as much. There's not much structure because it's just fabric but it also wraps around your hip so it doesn't bounce much. It's also a little bit bigger than I thought it would be and there's a spot on the bag, probably glue. But overall, I like it.
